q1.question: What is the AI Concept Builder?
q1.answer: The AI Concept Builder is an all-in-one platform for entrepreneurs that combines AI-powered consulting, business plan creation, funding research, and team management in one tool.

q2.question: How does the AI consulting work?
q2.answer: Our AI has been specially trained for startup consulting and can help you with all questions about starting your business - from the business idea to financing.

q3.question: Is the service free?
q3.answer: We offer a free initial analysis and various pricing plans for advanced features. Beta testers get 3 months of free access.

q4.question: Who is the platform suitable for?
q4.answer: Our platform is suitable for all entrepreneurs - from first-time founders to serial entrepreneurs. No matter what stage of your startup journey you're in.

q5.question: How secure is my data?
q5.answer: Data protection and security have the highest priority. All data is transmitted encrypted and stored in German data centers.

crystal_clear.title: Crystal Clear
crystal_clear.desc: I know exactly what I'm selling, to whom, and how I make money

rough_direction.title: Rough Direction
rough_direction.desc: The idea is there, but details still need to be worked out

still_vague.title: Still Vague
still_vague.desc: I have an idea, but I'm still at the beginning of development

validated_customers.title: Yes, with real customers
validated_customers.desc: I have already spoken with potential customers or made first sales

basic_research.title: Basic Research
basic_research.desc: I have done market research, but haven't spoken directly with customers yet

no_validation.title: Not yet validated
no_validation.desc: I'm still figuring out my target group and their needs

fully_secured.title: Fully Secured
fully_secured.desc: Equity, loan approval, or investors are already in place

partially_secured.title: Partially Secured
partially_secured.desc: Part of the financing is secured, the rest is in planning

experienced_entrepreneur.title: Experienced Entrepreneur
experienced_entrepreneur.desc: I have already successfully founded a company or have leadership experience

expert.title: Subject Matter Expert

motivated_learner.desc: Little experience, but high motivation and willingness to learn

immediately.title: Immediately
immediately.desc: I'm ready and will start within the next 4 weeks

this_quarter.desc: I want to start in the next 3 months

within_year.title: Within a Year
within_year.desc: I'm preparing for the long term

open_timeline.title: Still Open
